name: Oyster Wars
description:
STANDARD MOVES

A - Jump
X - Slash
X on Ground Held - Aim Up
X in Air - Air Slash
B - Dash
Y - Action
RB - Throw Grenade
RT - Shoot
LB - LockOn
LT - Slow Walk
Right Stick - Control Camera
Left Stick - Move

BOAT CONTROLS

Y - Start Boat/Stop
RT - Drive
Right Stick -> Camera
Left Stick -> Turn
A - Jump Out Of Boat

SPECIAL MOVES 

Air Slash -> Shoot => Double Jump/ Shoot Down Diagonal
Dash  on Ground -> Jump(At end of Dash) => LongJump
Jump -> Grenade => Drop Grenade
